text: <@U01NLJDQM8V> I can confirm that the Ecommerce Bridge API does not currently allow you to update a Deal to a custom dealstage within the Ecommerce Deal pipeline. I found a related community forum issue raised in 2019, and have provided a workaround solution for this case. I hope this is helpful: <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/APIs-Integrations/ECommerce-Bridge-Can-t-add-new-pipeline-stage/td-p/248504>
